string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Dont worry about what anybody else is going to do. The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
It is said that the real winner is the one who lives in today but able to see tomorrow.
There really is no learning without doing.
The best way to learn to live with our limitations is to know them.
Everything should be made as simple as possible, but no simpler.
The great dividing line between success and failure can be expressed in five words: I did not have time.
He causes his sun to rise on the evil and the good, and sends rain on the righteous and the unrighteous.
Everybody makes their own fun. If you dont make it yourself, it aint fun — its entertainment.
Simplicity takes effort — genius, even.
Show, dont tell.
If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice.
The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.
Life moves pretty fast. If you dont stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
The direct pursuit of happiness is a recipe for an unhappy life.
Its no trick for talented people to be interesting, but it is a gift to be interested.
For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.
There are many ways to avoid success in life, but the most sure-fire ust might be procrastination.
When all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail.
If there is a will, there is a way.
In terms of energy, its better to make a wrong choice than none at all.
Courage is grace under pressure.
Satisfaction lies in mindful repetition, the discovery of endless richness in subtle variations on familiar themes.
Before enlightenment, chop wood and carry water. After enlightenment, chop wood and carry water.
Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it.
